Reglementation.Afin de préserver les milieux naturels l: In order to preserve the natural environment, bivouacking and swimming are prohibited in this area. Fires and drone flights are prohibited.
Reglementation.Dans cette zone, le bivouac est toléré e: In this zone, bivouacs are tolerated and tents are prohibited before 7pm and after 9am the following day. Fires and drone flights are prohibited. From August to September, a herd of cattle grazes here. Please keep away from the fences and respect the guard dog.
Reglementation.Afin de préserver les milieux naturels l: In order to preserve the natural environment, bivouacking and swimming are prohibited in this area from 1 July to 31 August. Fires and drone flights are prohibited.
Reglementation.Dans cette zone, le bivouac est toléré e: In this zone, bivouacs are tolerated and tents are prohibited before 7pm and after 9am the following day. Fires and drone flights are prohibited.
Reglementation.Dans cette zone, le bivouac est déconsei: In this zone, bivouacs are not recommended and tents are forbidden before 7pm and after 9am the following day. Fires and drone flights are prohibited.
Reglementation.Afin de préserver les milieux naturels l: In order to preserve the natural environment, bivouacking and swimming are prohibited in this area. Fires and drone flights are prohibited. Contact the Pierre à Bérard refuge for bivouacs. Tel: 04.50.54.62.08.
